comments:
1) installed the SDK and user ui for build I20071120-0800 using p2 admin UI
2) From within end user UI, updated SDK to build I20071120-1300
3) Then attempted to update "userui" to I20071120-1300, and got the following exception:

Not sure if it matters, but the agent I used in step 1) was old - I think from I20071101. However, the failure occurred in the end user UI, which is using latest p2 code.

Fixed. This was a bug I introduced while getting rid of ResolvedInstallableUnitFragment. I was accidentally wrapping an IInstallableUnitFragment inside a ResolvedInstallableUnit. Fixed in ResolutionHelper, and tested with new test class ReplacePlanTest.
*** Bug 210596 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
